title: [BUG] samples.zip missing from releases since 2020
body:
### Description

Hi,

It seems that the archive `samples.zip` mentioned at https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/main/samples/README.md is missing since around August 2020.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2f31b637-4585-49c3-8f0d-0bdb97c38caa)

So either the readme is outdated, or there is an issue with release process. Is there another way to get built samples?
